TechnologyDescriptionSc: 广东森德利环保新材料科技有限公司自主研发的“硬质高透明PVC用镁铝锌无毒复合稳定剂” 可以取代有机锡稳定剂，生产环保硬质高透明PVC压延产品，耐候性更好，降低产品成本, 是新一代的环保型高效PVC热稳定助剂。产品应用于医疗、食品包装材料、儿童玩具、建筑材料等PVC压延产品。
TechNameTc: 硬質高透明PVC用鎂鋁鋅無毒複合穩定劑
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 廣東森德利環保新材料科技有限公司自主研發的“硬質高透明PVC用鎂鋁鋅無毒複合穩定劑” 可以取代有機錫穩定劑，生產環保硬質高透明PVC壓延產品，耐候性更好，降低產品成本, 是新一代的環保型高效PVC熱穩定助劑。產品應用於醫療、食品包裝材料、兒童玩具、建築材料等PVC壓延產品。
TechNameEn: Mg/Al/Zn Non-toxic Complex Stabilizer for High Transparent Rigid PVC Products
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The project “Mg/Al/Zn Non-toxic Complex Stabilizer for High Transparent Rigid PVC Products” was developed by Sundly Environmental Protection New Material Co., Ltd. This stabilizer can replace organotin stabilizers to produce high transparent rigid calendered PVC products. Its weather ability is better and it can reduce product costs. It is an environmental friendly PVC heat stabilizing auxiliary of a new generation. It can be used in high transparent rigid calendered PVC products such as medical and food packaging, toys, construction materials, etc.

CompanyNameEn: SHANDONG SCIENGY NEW MATERIALS CO., LTD
CompanyNameSc: 山东赛恩吉新材料有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 山東賽恩吉新材料有限公司
TechNameSc: 赛恩吉挤出级PPS
TechnologyDescriptionSc: Sciengy作为聚苯硫醚（PPS）的生产商，将于本次Chinaplas国际塑胶展上推出挤出级PPS材料。Sciengy独立开发的挤出级PPS改性材料在过去一直由国际PPS行业巨头主导。Sciengy的创新再次打破了国际垄断。Siengy®RS系列产品适用于管道及其其他应用。 Sciengy®RS系列产品颜色自然为灰白色，易于着色。它既保留了PPS改性材料的优异性能，如耐高温，耐腐蚀，阻燃等，也具有更好的韧性，伸长率和冲击强度。可满足不同应用领域的材料要求。
TechNameTc: 賽恩吉擠出級PPS
TechnologyDescriptionTc: Sciengy作為聚苯硫醚（PPS）的生產商，將於本次Chinaplas國際塑膠展上推出擠出級PPS材料。 Sciengy獨立開發的擠出級PPS改性材料在過去一直由國際PPS行業巨頭主導。 Sciengy的創新再次打破了國際壟斷。 Siengy®RS系列產品適用於管道及其其他應用。 Sciengy®RS系列產品顏色自然為灰白色，易於著色。它既保留了PPS改性材料的優異性能，如耐高溫，耐腐蝕，阻燃等，也具有更好的韌性，伸長率和衝擊強度。可滿足不同應用領域的材料要求。
TechNameEn: Sciengy Extrusion Grade PPS
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Sciengy as a manufacturer of PPS in China, will launch extrusion grade PPS material in Chinaplas. Sciengy's independently developed extrusion grade PPS modified material fills the gap in the Sciengy RS series.This high-toughness product has been dominated by the PPS industry giant in the past.Sciengy's innovation once again broke the international monopoly.Sciengy®RS series products that comprises different extrusion grades for pipe and tubing applications. Sciengy®RS series products is naturally off-white in color,and readily accept pigmentation.It not only retains the excellent properties of PPS modified materials such as high temperature resistance,corrosion resistance,flame retardancy,etc.,but also has better toughness,elongation and impact strength.Able to meet the various requirements of materials in different application areas,such as automotive,chemical industrial,hot water system,etc.

CompanyNameSc: 柯尼卡美能达（中国）投资有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 柯尼卡美能達（中國）投資有限公司
TechNameSc: 新一代便携式分光测色计，可同时测量色彩与光泽度
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 柯尼卡美能达新推出的CM-26dG、CM-26d和CM-25d是旧款型号CM-2600d和CM-2500d分光测色计的继任产品，被汽车和IT行业的众多客户广泛使用，新型产品主要适用于汽车内饰、智能手机和平板电脑的生产流程。二合一型的分光测色计CM-26dG能够同时快速测量色彩和光泽度，改进检测流程，有助于提升效率，有效节省人力成本。CM-26dG系列性能优异，仪器的器间差小，这一优势使得仪器可覆盖从零部件制造商到成品制造商的整个供应链质量管控，在日新月异的全球化供应链中实现数字化色彩数据管理。
TechNameTc: 新一代便攜式分光測色計，可同時測量色彩與光澤度
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 柯尼卡美能達新推出的CM-26dG、CM-26d和CM-25d是舊款型號CM-2600d和CM-2500d分光測色計的繼任產品，被汽車和IT行業的眾多客戶廣泛使用，新型產品主要適用於汽車內飾、智能手機和平板電腦的生產流程。二合一型的分光測色計CM-26dG能夠同時快速測量色彩和光澤度，改進檢測流程，有助於提升效率，有效節省人力成本。 CM-26dG系列性能優異，儀器的器間差小，這一優勢使得儀器可覆蓋從零部件製造商到成品製造商的整個供應鏈質量管控，在日新月異的全球化供應鏈中實現數字化色彩數據管理。
TechNameEn: Konica Minolta to Release New Portable Spectrophotometers to Help Improve Productivity, Including the CM-26dG Capable of Simultaneously Measuring Color and Gloss
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The CM-26dG, CM-26d, and CM-25d are new models being introduced as successors to the CM-2600d and CM-2500d spectrophotometers used by many customers in the automobile and IT industries. These products are used mainly at production sites that manufacture interior parts for automobiles and exterior parts for smartphones and tablets, helping to increase efficiency and reduce manpower in customer operations and enabling digital color data management across increasingly globalized supply chains.The CM-26dG is a two-in-one type of spectrophotometer that can simultaneously measure color and gloss.The CM-26dG series provides extremely high inter-instrument agreement, with very little variation among units. This enables these instruments to be used for quality control across the supply chain, from component part manufacturers to those of finished products.

CompanyNameEn: Zhejiang Xusen Non-halogen Smoke Suppressing Fire Retardants Co.,Ltd.
CompanyNameSc: 浙江旭森非卤消烟阻燃剂有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 浙江旭森非鹵消煙阻燃劑有限公司
TechNameSc: 聚烯烃用无卤阻燃剂，氮磷复合、低烟无卤膨胀型
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1. 热稳定性和耐水解性能好； 2. 阻燃效率高，用量低于常规体系，且对于高熔指PP阻燃效果依然优良； 3. 与聚烯烃树脂的相容性好，流动性好于常规体系； 4. 玻纤、填料、炭黑等添加剂对本品阻燃的影响远小于常规体系。
TechNameTc: 聚烯烴用無鹵阻燃劑，氮磷複合、低煙無鹵膨脹型
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1. 熱穩定性和耐水解性能好；2. 阻燃效率高，用量低於常規體系，且對於高熔指PP阻燃效果依然優良；3. 與聚烯烴樹脂的相容性好，流動性好於常規體系；4. 玻纖、填料、炭黑等添加劑對本品阻燃的影響遠小於常規體系。
TechNameEn: Non-halogen fire retardant for Polyolefine, Phosphorus-Nitrogen type intumescent flame retardant
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1. Good thermal stability and hydrolysis resistance; 2. High flame retardant efficiency, low usage, better performance for high melt index PP; 3. Good compatibility with Polyolefine, better good mobility compared to the normal FR system; 4. Low-impact when additives added, like glass fiber, fillers, carbon black and so on.

CompanyNameEn: Shen Zhen Jie Jia You Plastic C.,Ltd.
CompanyNameSc: 深圳市杰嘉友塑胶有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 深圳市傑嘉友塑膠有限公司
TechNameSc: TPU纱线─一种新型的纺织材料
TechnologyDescriptionSc: TPU纱线性能说明 1.高弹性，耐磨,高强度，防滑,耐水解,低温柔韧;2.热定型3D效果，易粘合,超细,可印刷,形状记忆;3.防抗菌，抗静电，抗UV,透透湿,防火阻燃，面效果等;TPU纱线的应用范围: 鞋面，背包，肩带,坐垫,床垫,地毯,餐桌垫，座椅织物等高性能纺织类织品; TPU纱线纺织工艺:梭织(提花),针织，飞织，圆形机,经编等织布工艺
TechNameTc: TPU紗線─一種新型的紡織材料
TechnologyDescriptionTc: TPU紗線性能說明1.高彈性，耐磨,高強度，防滑,耐水解,低溫柔韌;2.熱定型3D效果，易粘合,超細,可印刷,形狀記憶;3.防抗菌，抗靜電，抗UV,透透濕,防火阻燃，面效果等;TPU紗線的應用範圍: 鞋面，背包，肩帶,坐墊,床墊,地毯,餐桌墊，座椅織物等高性能紡織類織品; TPU紗線紡織工藝紡織工藝:梭織(提花),針織，飛織，圓形機,經編等織布工藝
TechNameEn: TPU Yarn ─ a new textile material, which processed into a cer tain degree of fineness products by textile fiber and TPU materials .
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Performance description: High elasticity, wear resistance, high strength, anti-skid, hydrolysis resistance, low temperature fexibilty; Thermal setting 3D effect, easy to compound, superfine, easy to printing, shape memory; Mildew fungus resistance, anti-static, ant-uv, breathable and moisture-permeable, fire retardant, matt effect, etc Application range of TPU yarn: high performance textile fabrics such as vamp,knapsack, shoulder strap, cushion , mattresscarpet, table mat, seat fabric, etc. Textile technology: shuttle weaving (jacquard), knitting, flying weaving, circularmachine, warp weaving and other weaving technology.

CompanyNameSc: 深圳市兴华颜料色母有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 深圳市興華顏料色母有限公司
TechNameSc: 溶剂染料：溶剂蓝35、36，溶剂红104，111等
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 用作溶液的染料材料，附着在它们所应用的任何东西上(如纺织品、头发、木材、食品)，可用于装饰、美学和艺术目的。它们还可以用作标识符，比如一些国家在选举中用来标记选民手指的紫色染料，或者牧民用来标记羊群中羊群的羊毛染料。荧光增亮染料改善了纺织品和纸张的外观。造影剂和荧光染料使选定的细胞和器官在生物和医学成像中脱颖而出。染料激光器不仅功能强大，而且可以发射波长范围内的激光，产生“可调谐”激光束，用于制造、医疗应用、天文研究和光谱学。染料激光束甚至可以用来蒸发纹身墨水。
TechNameTc: 溶劑染料：溶劑藍35、36，溶劑紅104，111等
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 用作溶液的染料材料，附著在它們所應用的任何東西上(如紡織品、頭髮、木材、食品)，可用於裝飾、美學和藝術目的。它們還可以用作標識符，比如一些國家在選舉中用來標記選民手指的紫色染料，或者牧民用來標記羊群中羊群的羊毛染料。熒光增亮染料改善了紡織品和紙張的外觀。造影劑和熒光染料使選定的細胞和器官在生物和醫學成像中脫穎而出。染料激光器不僅功能強大，而且可以發射波長范圍內的激光，產生“可調諧”激光束，用於製造、醫療應用、天文研究和光譜學。染料激光束甚至可以用來蒸發紋身墨水。
TechNameEn: Solvent Blue35, Solvent Blue 36, Solvent Red 104, Solvent Red 111, Solvent Red 254,Solvent Green 3, Solvent Violet 13, Solvent Yellow 24, Solvent Orange 60
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Dyescoloring materials that are applied as a solution and cling to whatever they are applied to (e.g., textiles, hair, wood, food) can be used for decorative, aesthetic, and artistic purposes. They can also be used as identifiers, like the purple dye that some countries use to mark voters' fingers during an election or the wool dyes that sheep herders use to mark the sheep in their flocks. Fluorescent brightening dyes improve the appearance of textiles and paper. Contrast agents and fluorescent dyes make selected cells and organs stand out for biological and medical imaging. Dye-based lasers are not only powerful, but they also emit laser light over a range of wavelengths, producing "tunable" laser beams for manufacturing, medical applications, astronomical research, and spectroscopy. Dye laser beams can even be used to vaporize tattoo inks.

CompanyNameSc: 威海金合思化工有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 威海金合思化工有限公司
TechNameSc: 低密度，优异的熔体强度
TechnologyDescriptionSc: JINHASS K-418是一种具有多层结构的高分子量丙烯酸酯类发泡调节剂，适用于聚氯乙烯(PVC)发泡制品的制造加工，如自由发泡、结皮发泡、共挤或共混改性。该产品在应用于PVC挤出发泡板材、管材、异型材时非常有效。
TechNameTc: 低密度，優異的熔體強度
TechnologyDescriptionTc: JINHASS K-418是一種具有多層結構的高分子量丙烯酸酯類發泡調節劑，適用於聚氯乙烯(PVC)發泡製品的製造加工，如自由發泡、結皮發泡、共擠或共混改性。該產品在應用於PVC擠出發泡板材、管材、異型材時非常有效。
TechNameEn: Low density; Outstanding melt strength enhancement
TechnologyDescriptionEn: JINHASS K-418 is a multi-layer structured high molecular weight foaming processing aid made by acrylate copolymer, from a multi-step emulsion polymerization. It can be applied to PVC foam processes, such as free foam, celuka foam and co-extrusion foam, etc. This product is more favorable for the general applications like PVC foam boards, pipes or profiles.

CompanyNameSc: 庆云鑫洋新材料有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 慶雲鑫洋新材料有限公司
TechNameSc: 色母粒
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 色母粒采用原料PE、PP、PVC、PET、ABS等，无毒，无污染，可分解。分散性好，流速好，着色均匀，产品物美价廉。可以用于包装行业、注塑行业、管材、拉丝、建筑、汽车、生活用品。硫酸钡填充母粒、碳酸钙填充母粒、硫酸钠填充母粒采用优质的原材料。透明度高，降低成本效果好，无杂质颗粒，无毒，无污染。
TechNameTc: 色母粒
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 色母粒採用原料PE、PP、PVC、PET、ABS等，無毒，無污染，可分解。分散性好，流速好，著色均勻，產品物美價廉。可以用於包裝行業、注塑行業、管材、拉絲、建築、汽車、生活用品。硫酸鋇填充母粒、碳酸鈣填充母粒、硫酸鈉填充母粒採用優質的原材料。透明度高，降低成本效果好，無雜質顆粒，無毒，無污染。
TechNameEn: Masterbatch:  non-toxic, non-polluting and decomposable.
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Masterbatch is made of raw materials such as PE, PP, PVC, PET, ABS, etc. It is non-toxic, non-polluting and decomposable. Good dispersibility, good flow rate, uniform coloration, and good quality and low price. Can be used in the packaging industry, injection molding industry, pipe, wire drawing, construction, automotive, and daily necessities. Barium sulfate filler masterbatch, calcium carbonate filler masterbatch, and sodium sulfate filler masterbatch are made of high quality raw materials. It has high transparency and good cost reduction, no impurity particles, no toxicity, no pollution.

CompanyNameTc: 廣州市朝江新材料有限公司

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 消泡剂：防止泡沫的形成和减少泡沫；强烈吸收水分；减少能源消耗；提高力学性能和外观。 填充剂：快速与载体反应；高纯度；减少PE/PP原材料用量，降低塑料原料的成本；不影响生产工艺 彩色母粒/黑色母粒：最高的机械强度保持率；可用的颜色范围广泛；可按客户产品定制；颜色鲜艳的高浓度颜料

CompanyNameSc: 东莞市荣晟颜料有限公司

TechNameSc: 发泡色母粒
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 发泡色母粒是由聚烯烃载体、颜料、分散剂，经特殊工艺加工而成的一种塑料制品着色颗粒。本产品适用于LDPE、HDPE、LLDPE、PP等为基料的注塑、中空成型等着色。本产品具有分散性能好、耐热、耐迁移性好、色泽鲜艳、塑化性能好、使用方便等特点。
TechNameTc: 發泡色母粒

TechNameEn: Foam color masterbatch
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Foaming masterbatch is a kind of plastic product coloring granule which is made of polyolefin carrier, pigment, dispersant and processed by special technology. This product is suitable for LDPE, HDPE, LLDPE, PP as the base material of injection molding, hollow molding and other coloring.The product has the characteristics of good dispersion, good heat resistance, good migration resistance, bright color, good plasticization performance, easy to use and so on.

TechNameEn: no dust solution
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Transform the product from powder to beads, especially the Ca-ST, easy to use and no dust.

TechNameSc: 比表面积大，吸附性极强，白度高，比重小
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 微孔硅酸钙一种新型功能性硅酸盐，该材料干燥情况下是固体白色粉末状颗粒，具有比表面积大、吸附性强、白度高、粒度分布范围小、堆积密度低、导热系数小等特点。作为新型的塑料除味粉体，微孔硅酸钙除味效果显著，效率高，同时加工过程中也会抑制烟气的生成。
TechNameTc: 比表面積大，吸附性極強，白度高，比重小
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 微孔硅酸鈣一種新型功能性硅酸鹽，該材料乾燥情況下是固體白色粉末狀顆粒，具有比表面積大、吸附性強、白度高、粒度分佈範圍小、堆積密度低、導熱係數小等特點。作為新型的塑料除味粉體，微孔硅酸鈣除味效果顯著，效率高，同時加工過程中也會抑製菸氣的生成。
TechNameEn: Large specific surface area, strong adsorption, high whiteness, small specific gravity
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Microporous calcium silicate is a new type of functional silicate, which is a solid white powder particle under dry conditions. It is characterized by large specific surface area, strong adsorption, high whiteness, small particle size distribution range, low bulk density and small thermal conductivity. As a new type of plastic deodorizing powder, microporous calcium silicate has remarkable deodorizing effect and high efficiency.

CompanyNameEn: Nanjing KY Chemical Machinery Co., Ltd.
CompanyNameSc: 南京科亚化工成套装备有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 南京科亞化工成套裝備有限公司
TechNameSc: 专注于高质量色母粒和工程塑料的小规模生产机型
TechnologyDescriptionSc: SK40Plus 螺杆直径介于传统的35和50之间，专注于高质量色母粒和工程塑料的小规模生产，产能可达500kg/h，专门为高质量的色母粒生产重新设计了加工段，提供了多种规格的螺杆元件，筒体有4D和6D的不同长度，方便工艺工程师为适应更多配方灵活调整螺杆设计。SK40Plus采用进口的HIP粉末冶金材料，为更高含量的色母生产提供了方便，高效冷却管路配置了进口同轴阀，筒体采用全新的径向冷却水道设计，并使用意大利进口的加热元件，在提高温控效率的同时也减少了筒体的温差分布和热变形，提高了设备使用寿命。
TechNameTc: 專注於高品質色母粒和工程塑料的小規模生產機型
TechnologyDescriptionTc: SK40Plus 螺杆直徑介於傳統的35和50之間，專注於高品質色母粒和工程塑料的小規模生產，產能可達500kg/h，專門為高品質的色母粒生產重新設計了加工段，提供了多種規格的螺杆元件，筒體有4D和6D的不同長度，方便工藝工程師為適應更多配方靈活調整螺杆設計。SK40Plus採用進口的HIP粉末冶金材料，為更高含量的色母生產提供了方便，高效冷卻管路配置了進口同軸閥，筒體採用全新的徑向冷卻水道設計，並使用義大利進口的加熱元件，在提高溫控效率的同時也減少了筒體的溫差分佈和熱變形，提高了設備使用壽命。
TechNameEn: Small-scale production machines focusing on high-quality color masterbatch and engineering plastics
TechnologyDescriptionEn: SK40Plus screw, whose diameter is between 35 and 50, specializes in the small-scale production of high-quality color masterbatch and engineering plastics with a capacity of 500 kg/h. It specially redesigns the processing section for the production of high-quality color masterbatch and provides various specifications of screw components. The cylinder has different lengths of 4D and 6D, which makes it convenient for process engineers to flexibly adjust the screw design for more formulations. SK40Plus uses imported HIP powder metallurgy material, which provides convenience for the production of higher content masterbatch. The high efficiency cooling pipeline is equipped with imported coaxial valves. The cylinder adopts a new radial cooling water channel design, and the heating element imported from Italy, which improves the efficiency of temperature control, reduces the temperature difference distribution and thermal deformation of the cylinder, and improves the service life of the equipment.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 免干燥平行双螺杆挤出PET片材生产线采用平行双螺杆挤出机，螺筒带有真空排气系统，生产线配有PLC控制系统，相较于传统的单螺杆挤出机，免去了连续结晶、干燥、除湿系统，智能化程度提高，节省30%以上的能耗，产量提高20%以上。新型PET片材已经广泛应用于热成型吸塑包装、礼品包装、五金包装等领域。
TechNameTc: 免乾燥平行雙螺杆擠出PET片材生產線
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 免乾燥平行雙螺杆擠出PET片材生產線採用平行雙螺杆擠出機，螺筒帶有真空排氣系統，生產線配有PLC控制系統，相較于傳統的單螺杆擠出機，免去了連續結晶、乾燥、除濕系統，智慧化程度提高，節省30%以上的能耗，產量提高20%以上。新型PET片材已經廣泛應用於熱成型吸塑包裝、禮品包裝、五金包裝等領域。
TechNameEn: Drying-Free Parallel Twin Screws Extruding PET Sheet Production Line
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Drying-free parallel twin-screw extruding PET sheet production line adopts parallel twin-screw extruder with PLC controlling system, and there is one vacuum drying system installed with the barrel. Compared with the traditional single screw extruder, the new designed machine has no continuous crystallizing & drying & dehumidifying system, so that the energy could be saved more than 30% and the capacity could be increased more than 20%. Now the sheet products have been widely used for thermoforming, gifts and hardware packing, etc.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: SPC/LVT 多层地板一步法挤出，贴合生产线 生产线优点： 1.挤出SPC, LVT 地板基材，同时实现在线多层同步贴合 2 挤出机产量高，速度快 3 采用先进的冷却系统，冷却成型速度快 4.可贴合玻纤等高强度材料， 成品地板质量高 5.贴合多层软材质，成品地板脚感好

TechNameEn: 1.Flooring base sheet extrusion with 3-4 layers soft sheet 2.Bigger extruder for bigger extrusion output 3.Advanced cooling system 4.Better  final flooring sheet wih special material lamination
TechnologyDescriptionEn: One Step Multi Layer SPC LVT Floor Machine Extrusion Line  Advantage: 1.Flooring base sheet extrusion with 3-4 layers soft sheet hot sticking lamination 2.Bigger extruder for bigger extrusion output 3.Advanced cooling system adopted for better cooling effect situable for bigger output. 4.Better quality of final flooring sheet wih special material laminated

CompanyNameSc: 南京创博机械设备有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 南京創博機械設備有限公司
TechNameSc: 连续长纤浸润包覆造粒成套机组
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 长纤浸润包覆生产线（LFT-G）：该设备可加工PP、PA、PET、PLA、PBT、PPA等材料，具有浸润程度高、纤维损伤少、工艺过程稳定可控、生产效率高等特点。与传统短纤维增强材料相比，产品具有更高强度、更高弹性模量、更高抗冲性能和使用寿命长等特点。在航空、汽车、建筑、电器，家电等行业零部件轻量化、高性能化的过程中有广阔的前景。
TechNameTc: 連續長纖浸潤包覆造粒成套機組
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 長纖浸潤包覆生產線（LFT-G）：該設備可加工PP、PA、PET、PLA、PBT、PPA等材料，具有浸潤程度高、纖維損傷少、工藝過程穩定可控、生產效率高等特點。與傳統短纖維增強材料相比，產品具有更高強度、更高彈性模量、更高抗沖性能和使用壽命長等特點。在航空、汽車、建築、電器，家電等行業零部件輕量化、高性能化的過程中有廣闊的前景。
TechNameEn: Long fiber reinforced Thermoplastic Infiltration and Extrusion line (LFT-G)
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The long fiber reinforced thermoplastic infiltration and extrusion line (LFT-G): It has high impregnation grade, less fiber damage, stable process control and efficiency production. It can process PP, PA, PLA, PET, PPA, PBT, PPS, etc. Final products gains great features than traditional fiber reinforcement such as much higher intension, higher modulus of elasticity, higher shock resistance and longer life use, etc. Final granules are widely applied in aviation industry, auto field, building, electrical equipment manufacturing, home appliance for light-weight and high performance.

CompanyNameSc: 无锡灵鸽机械科技股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 無錫靈鴿機械科技股份有限公司
TechNameSc: 微量配方自动计量磅秤
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 微量配方自动计量磅秤是用于橡胶、塑料、染整、食品、化工、医药等行业中的小料自动配料设备。本设备的研发主要是为解决困扰行业已久的配料问题：（1）由于配方原料种类多、配方差异大，且须经常调整配方中的原料种类、比例和重量，急需一套精准、快速、自动化的称量设备来有效提高生产效率；（2）人工称量配料错误率高；（3）已有设备计量精度不够、批次计量时间太长。本设备经过多年研发改进，可同时称量多种原料，满足复杂配方称量需求，其具备计量精准、计量速度快、全自动化运行等优势。
TechNameTc: 微量配方自動計量磅秤
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 微量配方自動計量磅秤是用於橡膠、塑膠、染整、食品、化工、醫藥等行業中的小料自動配料設備。本設備的研發主要是為解決困擾行業已久的配料問題：（1）由於配方原料種類多、配方差異大，且須經常調整配方中的原料種類、比例和重量，急需一套精准、快速、自動化的稱量設備來有效提高生產效率；（2）人工稱量配料錯誤率高；（3）已有設備計量精度不夠、批次計量時間太長。本設備經過多年研發改進，可同時稱量多種原料，滿足複雜配方稱量需求，其具備計量精准、計量速度快、全自動化運行等優勢。
TechNameEn: Intelligent micro batch dosing system
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Intelligent micro batch dosing system is used in rubber, plastics, food, chemical industry, medicine and other industries. The research and development of this equipment is mainly to solve the problems that have puzzled the industry for a long time: (1) Because of the variety of ingredients and the great difference of ingredients, and the need to regularly adjust the types, proportions and weights of raw materials in the formula, a set of accurate, fast and automatic weighing equipment is urgently needed to effectively improve production efficiency; (2) High error rate of manual weighing of ingredients; (3) Inadequate measurement accuracy of existing equipment, the batch measurement time is too long. This intelligent micro batch dosing system has the advantages of accurate measurement, fast measurement, automatic operation, etc.

CompanyNameSc: 青岛三益塑料机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 青島三益塑膠機械有限公司
TechNameSc: PVC SPC大型地板生产线
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 自动化大产量PVCSPC地板生产线，产量可高达约1.5吨/小时。最新机型整机采用智能一键同步模块，待设备稳定之后可自由切换一键同步和单独控制。一键同步是三益与西门子经过反复试机、修改最终确定的系统，也是目前国内真正意义上能实现速度同步的最完善系统。全套自动化控制系统运行稳定，节能环保；全线采用国际一流标准的安全防护，整套西门子的电气配置。
TechNameTc: PVC SPC大型地板生產線
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 自動化大產量PVCSPC地板生產線，產量可高達約1.5噸/小時。最新機型整機採用智慧一鍵同步模組，待設備穩定之後可自由切換一鍵同步和單獨控制。一鍵同步是三益與西門子經過反複試機、修改最終確定的系統，也是目前國內真正意義上能實現速度同步的最完善系統。全套自動化控制系統運行穩定，節能環保；全線採用國際一流標準的安全防護，整套西門子的電氣配置。
TechNameEn: PVC flooring production line
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The Automatic advanced large capacity SPC Flooring Extrusion Line with the advantages of stable running control system, energy saving and environmental friendly can reach to the production about 1.5T/h. The whole SPC Flooring Extrusion Line adopts the international first class level of safety protection and the full set of electrics is Authentic Germany SIEMENS. This PVC SPC flooring can take new feeling for customers.

CompanyNameSc: 江苏艾斯曼机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 江蘇艾斯曼機械有限公司
TechNameSc: PVC 塑料瓦成型机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 本机主要用于塑料瓦的成型。模块为一次性压铸成型，材质为优质铝，强度高。先进的机器中心，保证模块一次性装夹。传动平衡可靠，四缸启闭方便。它由电动机驱动，电动机可以前后移动。模块的失调距离可以手动调整，以调整波形的丰满度。
TechNameTc: PVC 塑膠瓦成型機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 本機主要用於塑膠瓦的成型。模組為一次性壓鑄成型，材質為優質鋁，強度高。先進的機器中心，保證模組一次性裝夾。傳動平衡可靠，四缸啟閉方便。它由電動機驅動，電動機可以前後移動。模組的失調距離可以手動調整，以調整波形的豐滿度。
TechNameEn: PVC plasic tile forming machine
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The Forming Machine is mainly used in the forming of plastic tile. The module is a one-time die-casting molding. The material is high quality aluminum with high strength. The Advanced machine center can guarantee one-time clamping of the module. The transmission is balanced and reliable, convenient to open and close by four cylinders. It is driven by motor, which can be moved forward and backward. The misalignment distance of the modules can be adjusted manually to adjust the fullness of the waveform.

CompanyNameEn: Leader Extrusion Machinery Ind. Co., Ltd.
CompanyNameSc: 鼎峰自動化股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 鼎峰自動化股份有限公司
TechNameSc: 微/奈米多层薄膜押出生产设备
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 此设备为多层共挤押出设计，让薄膜可具弹性，并透过分层效果加强分层贴合度，以提高产品张力性。 可依客户需求提供客制化：主机螺桿直径：75-180 mm / 机械线速度：250 m/min (max) / 厚度：0.012 mm-0.15 mm / 产能：150-800 kg/hr。功能性薄膜在材料运用的多样性也有无限可能性，例如添加抗氧化剂、阻隔剂，或复合材质的贴合，具有光控性，耐候性，导电性，阻隔性，防污性，装饰性等特性。
TechNameTc: 微/奈米多層薄膜押出生產設備
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 此設備為多層共擠押出設計，讓薄膜可具彈性，並透過分層效果加強分層貼合度，以提高產品張力性。 可依客戶需求提供客制化：主機螺桿直徑：75-180 mm / 機械線速度：250 m/min (max) / 厚度：0.012 mm-0.15 mm / 產能：150-800 kg/hr。功能性薄膜在材料運用的多樣性也有無限可能性，例如添加抗氧化劑、阻隔劑，或複合材質的貼合，具有光控性，耐候性，導電性，阻隔性，防汙性，裝飾性等特性。
TechNameEn: Micro / Nano-layer Film Extrusion Line
TechnologyDescriptionEn: This line is designed for multi-layer co-extrusion to make the film elastic and enhance the layer tension by layering to increase product tension. Customized is available for high capacity: Extruder (main screw): diameter 75-180 mm / Speed: 250 m/min (max) / Thickness: 0.012 mm-0.15 mm / Output: 150-800 kg/hr. Functional films are also infinitely possible in the diversity of materials used, such as the addition of antioxidants, barriers, or composite materials, with characteristics of light control, weather resistance, electrical conductivity, barrier properties, antifouling properties, decorative properties, etc.

CompanyNameSc: 政鈺機械股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 政鈺機械股份有限公司
TechNameSc: 光学级自动化模具与套筒式内塞机构
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 政钰新设计的特殊塞料机构，适用于食品容器包装等用途,可有效缩减厚边，采用全封闭式内塞，搭配套筒式省力机构设计调整宽幅，操作上更为简易。生产过程无须停机，可根据生产制品幅宽变化，在线连续调整宽幅，大幅降低调整时间，减少原料损耗，节省成本。本次也同步展出光学级片板膜用自动化模具，透过专业计算机CAE仿真程序与设计以及超精密研磨、抛光等加工，100%自制，精准掌握模具质量，可协助用户提高光学制品质量。
TechNameTc: 光學級自動化模具與套筒式內塞機構
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 政鈺新設計的特殊塞料機構，適用於食品容器包裝等用途,可有效縮減厚邊，採用全封閉式內塞，搭配套筒式省力機構設計調整寬幅，操作上更為簡易。生產過程無須停機，可根據生產製品幅寬變化，線上連續調整寬幅，大幅降低調整時間，減少原料損耗，節省成本。本次也同步展出光學級片板膜用自動化模具，透過專業電腦CAE模擬程式與設計以及超精密研磨、拋光等加工，100%自製，精准掌握模具品質，可協助使用者提高光學製品品質。
TechNameEn: Optical extrusion auto-die and sleeve-type inner deckle system
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Sleeve-type inner deckle system is GMA's new special design, applied on sheet die for making food container and package. The main function is to reduce the thickness of edge, fully enclosed inner deckle, labor-saving adjusting width device as sleeve-type, no need to stop production line for adjustment, easy to operate, save time and material. This time, GMA also show visitors Optical extrusion auto-die, applied on optical sheet and film. Through professional computer CAE simulation program and design, ultra-precision grinding, polishing and other processing, 100% made in house for excellent quality, to ensure the optical die channel surface are smooth and flat, to help user to improve product quality.

CompanyNameSc: 泉州诺达机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 泉州諾達機械有限公司
TechNameSc: TPU光学级流延生产线
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1、独特的螺杆塑化设计理念，完美的去晶点解决方案，可达到光学级效果。2、自主研发的全自动恒张力控制技术，彻底解决TPU弹性体材料收卷张力易拉伸变形问题。3、采用高效长时换网器技术，能最大减少因换网带来的晶点形成问题。4、一键式整机闭环控制，使其挤出能效是原来的1.5倍。
TechNameTc: TPU光學級流延生產線
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1、獨特的螺杆塑化設計理念，完美的去晶點解決方案，可達到光學級效果。2、自主研發的全自動恒張力控制技術，徹底解決TPU彈性體材料收卷張力易拉伸變形問題。3、採用高效長時換網器技術，能最大減少因換網帶來的晶點形成問題。4、一鍵式整機閉環控制，使其擠出能效是原來的1.5倍。
TechNameEn: Optical TPU Cast Film Production Line
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1. Unique screw plasticization design concept, perfect de-crystal point solution, can achieve optical grade effect. 2. The self-developed automatic constant tension control technology completely solves the problem of tension and deformation of TPU elastomer material winding tension. 3. The use of efficient long-term screen changer technology can minimize the formation of crystal points caused by changing the screen. 4. One-button whole machine closed-loop control, so that its extrusion efficiency is 1.5 times of the original.

CompanyNameSc: 南京国塑挤出装备有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 南京國塑擠出裝備有限公司
TechNameSc: 用于基材涂膜/复合，使其能够满足现代包装的复杂要求
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 设备采用一放一收设计，放卷采用双工位自动接换卷，磁粉张力设计，恒张力控制，生产加减速度可以同步比率控制，边料破碎在线回收，生产浪费少，速度可以达到50m\min，100m\min，150m\min三种设计，产品主要用于纸张类、防潮类、一次性衣物类等。
TechNameTc: 用於基材塗膜/複合，使其能夠滿足現代包裝的複雜要求
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 設備採用一放一收設計，放卷採用雙工位自動接換卷，磁粉張力設計，恒張力控制，生產加減速度可以同步比率控制，邊料破碎線上回收，生產浪費少，速度可以達到50m\min，100m\min，150m\min三種設計，產品主要用於紙張類、防潮類、一次性衣物類等。
TechNameEn: Used for substrate coating/compositing to meet the complex requirements of modern packaging
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The equipment adopts unwinding-winding design, the unwinding adopts exchange volume, magnetic powder tension design, constant tension control, and the production acceleration and deceleration speed can be synchronized. Ratio control, edge material crushing online recycling, less production waste, speed can reach three designs: 50m\min, 100m\min, 150m\min. It is mainly used for paper, moisture-proof, disposable clothing, etc.

CompanyNameSc: 舟山巴顿机械科技有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 舟山巴頓機械科技有限公司
TechNameSc: 一种显著耐腐蚀耐磨的螺杆涂层
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 舟山巴顿机械科技有限公司推出一种新型单双注射和挤出螺杆涂层，可以比高速氧气燃料（HVOF）热喷涂标准涂层更好地抵抗磨损和腐蚀。热喷涂层由直径仅为5微米的微小碳化钨球体组成，是标准HVOF涂层尺寸的六分之一到七分之一。在等离子体工艺中产生的小尺寸和均匀的颗粒形状允许它们在专有基质中更密集地包装。这些因素以及2.5倍的施加速度可使与螺杆的母金属更牢固的结合并改善耐磨性。
TechNameTc: 一種顯著耐腐蝕耐磨的螺杆塗層
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 舟山巴頓機械科技有限公司推出一種新型單雙注射和擠出螺杆塗層，可以比高速氧氣燃料（HVOF）熱噴塗標準塗層更好地抵抗磨損和腐蝕。熱噴塗層由直徑僅為5微米的微小碳化鎢球體組成，是標準HVOF塗層尺寸的六分之一到七分之一。在等離子體工藝中產生的小尺寸和均勻的顆粒形狀允許它們在專有基質中更密集地包裝。這些因素以及2.5倍的施加速度可使與螺杆的母金屬更牢固的結合並改善耐磨性。
TechNameEn: A new coating for screws can resist abrasive and corrosive wear significantly
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The new coating for single and twin injection and extrusion screws can resist abrasive and corrosive wear significantly better than standard coatings applied by high-velocity oxygen fuel (HVOF) thermal spray. The thermal-spray coating is made up of tiny tungsten carbide spheres only 5 microns in diameter, one-sixth to one-seventh the size of standard HVOF coatings. The small size and uniform shape of the particles produced in a plasma process permits them to be more densely packed in the proprietary matrix. These factors, along with 2.5times greater application velocity, reportedly results in a stronger bond with the parent metal of the screw and improved wear resistance.

CompanyNameEn: Foshan Yuen Gen Plastic Extrusion Machinery Factory
CompanyNameSc: 佛山市南海远锦塑料机械厂
CompanyNameTc: 佛山市南海遠錦塑膠機械廠
TechNameSc: 全不锈钢精密医疗管材挤出生产线
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1）生产速度提高30%；2）实现全数字化控制，操作更简单，从原来两个人操作一台机器缩减为一个人操作一台机器；3）采用闭环全自动控制，实现自动纠正产品误差；4）常用于生产精密医疗用导管。
TechNameTc: 全不銹鋼精密醫療管材擠出生產線
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1）生產速度提高30%；2）實現全數位化控制，操作更簡單，從原來兩個人操作一台機器縮減為一個人操作一台機器；3）採用閉環全自動控制，實現自動糾正產品誤差；4）常用於生產精密醫療用導管。
TechNameEn: Whole stainless steel precise medical tube extrusion production line
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1) The production speed is increased by 30%. 2) Realizing fully digital control, the operation is simpler, from the original two people operating one machine reduced to one person operating one machine. 3) Using closed-loop automatic control to achieve automatic correction of product errors. 4) Commonly used in precision medical catheters.

CompanyNameEn: Foshan Best Extrusion Tech. Co., Ltd
CompanyNameSc: 佛山巴斯特科技股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 佛山巴斯特科技股份有限公司
TechNameSc: 全自动盘卷机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 可用于PE、PERT小口径管材的自动收卷和切割。具有自动排线、切割、换卷及双工位收卷功能；排线、收卷及换卷驱动均使用独立伺服电机，通过数字编程控制；友好的人机操作界面，换卷、切割及夹紧同步完成，避免缓存及再上卷的时间浪费及操作失误的可能性。
TechNameTc: 全自動盤卷機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 可用於PE、PERT小口徑管材的自動收卷和切割。具有自動排線、切割、換卷及雙工位收卷功能；排線、收卷及換卷驅動均使用獨立伺服電機，通過數位程式設計控制；友好的人機操作介面，換卷、切割及夾緊同步完成，避免緩存及再上卷的時間浪費及操作失誤的可能性。
TechNameEn: Automatic Winder
TechnologyDescriptionEn: It can be used for automatic rolling and cutting of PE and PERT small diameter pipe. It has the functions of automatic emissions, cutting, roll-changing and double station rolling. Emissions, rolling and roll-changing drive all use separate servo motors and controlled by digital programming. It has user-friendly operation interface, roll-changing, cutting and clamping are completed synchronously, avoiding time wasted for caching, rewinding and the possibility of operation error.

CompanyNameSc: 锦越机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 錦越機械有限公司
TechNameSc: CCS 系列 颗粒料集中供料系统（含干燥）
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 这套集中供料系统实现原料集中处理、封闭输送，彻底避免车间噪音、灰尘、热气污染。解决原料重复人工搬运的高成本及因疏忽而产生的缺料问题，更不会混入不被允许的其它材料，降低了采购、耗电、维修成本，提高了产品质量和工作效率。同时可针对各种工程塑料粒子进行除湿干燥，应用于各种塑料造粒、挤出与注塑生产线。
TechNameTc: CCS 系列 顆粒料集中供料系統（含乾燥）
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 這套集中供料系統實現原料集中處理、封閉輸送，徹底避免車間噪音、灰塵、熱氣污染。解決原料重複人工搬運的高成本及因疏忽而產生的缺料問題，更不會混入不被允許的其它材料，降低了採購、耗電、維修成本，提高了產品品質和工作效率。同時可針對各種工程塑料粒子進行除濕乾燥，應用於各種塑膠造粒、擠出與注塑生產線。
TechNameEn: CCS Series Central Conveying System (Including drying system)
TechnologyDescriptionEn: This central conveying system realizes centralized processing of raw materials and closed transportation, completely avoiding workshop noise, dust and hot gas pollution. It solves the high cost of repeated manual handling of raw materials and inadvertently production insufficient drying problems, and do not mix other materials that are not allowed. What’s more, this central conveying system can reduce procurement, power consumption, maintenance costs, improve product quality and work efficiency. Meanwhile, It includes dryer system which can dehumidify various engineering plastics particles, applied to various plastic granulation, extrusion and injection production lines.

CompanyNameSc: 东莞市富佳机械设备有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 東莞市富佳機械設備有限公司
TechNameSc: 伺服热熔机（塑料网膜）
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1、与传统产品或其他同类型产品相较在性能方面有以下优胜：a）无污染，节能、环保；b）对产品性能无影响 ； 2、技术性的突破：a）对声音传播无干扰；b）防水、透音网膜、防尘网的焊接工艺上的改变；c）减少胶水等的干扰。 3、通过以下提升终端产品的外观及质量：a）通过瞬间温度熔接产品；b）不损坏产品外观和功能 。 4. 可以用于生产像耳机、音箱类产品、智能穿戴产品、汽车音箱产品、电子产品。
TechNameTc: 伺服熱熔機（塑膠網膜）
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1、與傳統產品或其他同類型產品相較在性能方面有以下優勝：a）無污染，節能、環保；b）對產品性能無影響 ； 2、技術性的突破：a）對聲音傳播無干擾；b）防水、透音網膜、防塵網的焊接工藝上的改變；c）減少膠水等的干擾。 3、通過以下提升終端產品的外觀及品質：a）通過瞬間溫度熔接產品；b）不損壞產品外觀和功能 。 4. 可以用於生產像耳機、音箱類產品、智慧穿戴產品、汽車音箱產品、電子產品。
TechNameEn: Heat Staking Machine (Plastic Mesh)
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1. The advantages: a) Pollution-free, Energy Conservation, Environment Protection; b) No influence to Product Performance. 2. The technological breakthroughs and benefits to the users: a) No interference to sound transmission. b) Technology improvement on waterproof, voice membrane, dustproof meshes. c) Less interference from glue.  3. End-product's appearance and quality improved as below: a) Product is fused by instantaneous temperature. b) No influence to Product Performance. 4. Application: Earphone, Speakers, Smart Wearing Products, Automotive Speakers, Electronic Products, etc.

CompanyNameEn: Shijiazhuang  Xirong rubber and plastic Machinery Co., Ltd
CompanyNameSc: 石家庄熙荣橡塑机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 石家莊熙榮橡塑機械有限公司
TechNameSc: 三螺杆挤出机 - 塑化效果强，混炼效果好，节省30-40%能源
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 三螺杆挤出机比双螺杆挤出机塑化快，混炼效果好，物料在高温情况下停留的时问短。优势：1.塑化效果快；2.混炼效果；3.节省30-40%能源，增加30-40%产量；4.低长径比，节省用地面积。
TechNameTc: 三螺杆擠出機 - 塑化效果強，混煉效果好，節省30-40%能源
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 三螺杆擠出機比雙螺杆擠出機塑化快，混煉效果好，物料在高溫情況下停留的時問短。優勢：1.塑化效果快；2.混煉效果；3.節省30-40%能源，增加30-40%產量；4.低長徑比，節省用地面積。
TechNameEn: Tripe-screw extruder - Faster plasticizing effect, Better mix effect, Save about 30%-40% energy
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Tripe-screw extruder has a faster plasticizing effect and better mix effect than the twin-screw extruder. The material keeps short time in high temperature. Advantages: 1.Faster plasticizing effect. 2. Better mix effect. 3. Save about 30%-40% energy, Increase output by 30-40 %. 4. Low L/D ratio, less place demand.

CompanyNameSc: 广州鑫电自控设备有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 廣州鑫電自控設備有限公司
TechNameSc: MG-4B失重式连续计量混配系统
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 每个系统最多可以配备4个配料秤，流量从0.25kg/h到1600kg/h，适用于颗粒料、回收料、粉料、纤维和液体。得益于采用模块化的设计，适用于各种不同计量混合要求。可以自动校正，无须手动取样称量或校正。整套系统由各个独立的计量单元组成，可以使加工制造商按照不同的应用组成不同的系统，在生产工艺变化时，可以快速更改计量系统的组成。拉出旋转机构让用户更容易拆装清洁。
TechNameTc: MG-4B失重式連續計量混配系統
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 每個系統最多可以配備4個配料秤，流量從0.25kg/h到1600kg/h，適用於顆粒料、回收料、粉料、纖維和液體。得益於採用模組化的設計，適用於各種不同計量混合要求。可以自動校正，無須手動取樣稱量或校正。整套系統由各個獨立的計量單元組成，可以使加工製造商按照不同的應用組成不同的系統，在生產工藝變化時，可以快速更改計量系統的組成。拉出旋轉機構讓用戶更容易拆裝清潔。
TechNameEn: MG-4B loss-in-weight masterbatch dosing system
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Each system can maximum equipped with 4 loss-in-weight feeders, feed rate from 0.25kg/h-1600kg/h, can applies to granular material, recycle material, powder, fiber and liquid. The modular design can fix every type of feeding situation. Auto-calibration is easier to operate compare to the traditional weight calibration. During production, user can easily change one of the component feeders or remove one of them for cleaning.

CompanyNameSc: 南京光瑞挤出装备有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 南京光瑞擠出裝備有限公司
TechNameSc: 免干燥，节能40%以上，多段抽真空的双螺杆挤出机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 南京光瑞消化吸收国外先进技术，采用双螺杆直接挤出加工PET片材，多路真空排气，无需预结晶干燥，可节能40%以上。同时由于配置了不停机换网器，可100%的使用回收料生产，极大地降低了成本。由于采用了双螺杆挤出机，可同时添加碳酸钙、PE等材料进行共混改性，从而达到降低成本，提高韧性等目的，如生产吸塑花盆、灯罩等产品。本生产线不需任何调整，可直接生产PLA（聚乳酸）等生物级全降解材料。本生产线上可换装柔性辊用以直接生产超薄片材（未经拉伸的薄膜）。
TechNameTc: 免乾燥，節能40%以上，多段抽真空的雙螺杆擠出機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 南京光瑞消化吸收國外先進技術，採用雙螺杆直接擠出加工PET片材，多路真空排氣，無需預結晶乾燥，可節能40%以上。同時由於配置了不停機換網器，可100%的使用回收料生產，極大地降低了成本。由於採用了雙螺杆擠出機，可同時添加碳酸鈣、PE等材料進行共混改性，從而達到降低成本，提高韌性等目的，如生產吸塑花盆、燈罩等產品。本生產線不需任何調整，可直接生產PLA（聚乳酸）等生物級全降解材料。本生產線上可換裝柔性輥用以直接生產超薄片材（未經拉伸的薄膜）。
TechNameEn: Conical Twin-screw Extrusion Line with multi-channel vacuum exhaust, and no need pre-crystallization & drying process, save energy more than 40%
TechnologyDescriptionEn: GORRAY actively absorb and adopt advanced foreign technology to make Conical Twin-screw Extrusion Line used for PET sheet & film. It can save energy more than 40% as it is multi-channel vacuum exhaust, and no need pre-crystallization & drying process. Due to configuring the non-stop net changer, it can use 100% recycled materials for the production, greatly reduce the cost. At the same time, CaCO and PE can be added together for blending modification to lower costs and improve toughness, can be used for making blister flowerpot and lampshade, etc.  Without any adjustment, this production line can directly produce PLA (polylactic acid) Sheet, and other full biodegradable material. It can use a kind of flexible roller to produce ultrathin sheet (unstretched film).

CompanyNameEn: Tianjin Level Vacuum Drying Equipment Manufacturing Corporationg Ltd.
CompanyNameSc: 天津莱沃真空干燥设备制造有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 天津萊沃真空乾燥設備製造有限公司
TechNameSc: 工程塑料的真空+微波干燥技术
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 通过运用麦克斯韦电磁理论，将真空与微波电磁场完美结合，研制出莱沃真空微波干燥机。该干燥机彻底颠覆了传统工程塑料干燥设备的技术理念，达到了良好的无氧化干燥效果。与传统干燥机相较，具有以下优势：1.干燥时间缩短75%以上；2.能耗节省80%以上；3.无氧化干燥确保原料特性从而提高最终产品品质。目前在工程塑料领域取得显著效果，如 PETG, PA, COP, PET, PET+50 %玻纤，PEEK，PC等。例如提高车灯行业中导光条的透光度，解决包装行业中PETG产品的脆断问题，透明产品泛黄问题等。
TechNameTc: 工程塑料的真空+微波乾燥技術
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 通過運用麥克斯韋電磁理論，將真空與微波電磁場完美結合，研製出萊沃真空微波乾燥機。該乾燥機徹底顛覆了傳統工程塑料乾燥設備的技術理念，達到了良好的無氧化乾燥效果。與傳統乾燥機相較，具有以下優勢：1.乾燥時間縮短75%以上；2.能耗節省80%以上；3.無氧化乾燥確保原料特性從而提高最終產品品質。目前在工程塑料領域取得顯著效果，如 PETG, PA, COP, PET, PET+50 %玻纖，PEEK，PC等。例如提高車燈行業中導光條的透光度，解決包裝行業中PETG產品的脆斷問題，透明產品泛黃問題等。
TechNameEn: Microwave vacuum drying system for engineering plastic
TechnologyDescriptionEn: By using Maxwell's electromagnetic theory and combining vacuum with microwave electromagnetic field perfectly, LEVEL vacuum microwave dryer was developed. The dryer completely overturned the technical concept of traditional engineering plastics drying equipment and achieved good non-oxidation drying effect. Compared with traditional dryer, it has the following advantages: 1. Drying time is shortened by more than 75%. 2. Energy consumption can be saved by more than 80%. 3. Non-oxidative drying ensures the characteristics of raw materials and improves the quality of final products. At present, significant results have been achieved in the field of Engineering plastics, such as PETG, PA, COP, PET, PET + 50% glass fiber, PEEK,PC etc. For example, improve the transmittance of light guide strip in automobile lamp industry, solve the fragile problem of PETG products in packaging industry, yellowing problem of transparent products, etc.

CompanyNameSc: 杭州彩谱科技有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 杭州彩譜科技有限公司
TechNameSc: 彩谱兼容透射反射分光测色仪CS-820N
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 台式分光测色仪CS-820N是一款智能、便捷、精准的分光测色仪，采用TFT真彩7inch电容触摸屏、全光源，照明方式：反射D/8、透射D/0(包含UV/排除UV测量），测量颜色精准稳定、存储容量大、PC端强大扩展功能，用于塑胶、印刷、涂料、汽配、金属、家电等行业和科研机构颜色精确分析与传递。
TechNameTc: 彩譜相容透射反射分光測色儀CS-820N
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 臺式分光測色儀CS-820N是一款智能、便捷、精准的分光測色儀，採用TFT真彩7inch電容觸控式螢幕、全光源，照明方式：反射D/8、透射D/0(包含UV/排除UV測量），測量顏色精准穩定、存儲容量大、PC端強大擴展功能，用於塑膠、印刷、塗料、汽配、金屬、家電等行業和科研機構顏色精確分析與傳遞。
TechNameEn: CHNSpec Reflectance and Transmittance Color Spectrophotometer CS-820N
TechnologyDescriptionEn: CS-820N is a smart, simple operation and high accurate bench-top spectrophotometer. It adopts 7 inches to TFT touch screen, full bands balanced light source, illumination system D/8 for reflectance, D/0 for transmittance (UV included /UV excluded), high accuracy color measurement result, large storage memory, Powerful extension on PC and widely used in plastic, printing, paint, auto parts, metal, home appliances and scientific research institutions for color communication.

CompanyNameEn: SHANGHAI EUTIN INTERNATIONAL TRADING CO., LTD.
CompanyNameSc: 上海韵鼎国际贸易有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 上海韻鼎國際貿易有限公司
TechNameSc: CALPAS能够检测各类塑料粒子粉末中的杂质
TechnologyDescriptionSc: CALPAS能够通过检测和分析在最终产品中存在并影响产品品质的异色颗粒来提升品质管理，异色包括：黑点、黄色粒子、红色粒子或者其它除树脂本体颜色以外的异色粒子，并且CALPAS还会提供异色粒子的尺寸和形状信息。除了检测异色粒子之外，CALPAS同时还可以检测和分析诸如长条、连粒、拖尾等异形粒子。
TechNameTc: CALPAS能夠檢測各類塑膠粒子粉末中的雜質
TechnologyDescriptionTc: CALPAS能夠通過檢測和分析在最終產品中存在並影響產品品質的異色顆粒來提升品質管理，異色包括：黑點、黃色粒子、紅色粒子或者其它除樹脂本體顏色以外的異色粒子，並且CALPAS還會提供異色粒子的尺寸和形狀資訊。除了檢測異色粒子之外，CALPAS同時還可以檢測和分析諸如長條、連粒、拖尾等異形粒子。
TechNameEn: CALPAS enable to improve the quality management via the detection and diagnosis the foreign colored material
TechnologyDescriptionEn: CALPAS enable to improve the quality management via the detection and diagnosis the foreign colored material such as Black dot, Red, Yellow and other unexpected colored particles which is most harmful for high quality appearance of the final products. And as the size and shape information of foreign colored material also provide, CALPAS also enable to detect a foreign shape such as long, Twin, snake skin and other of foreign shaped particles in a same instrument.

CompanyNameSc: 广东汉邦激光科技有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 廣東漢邦鐳射科技有限公司
TechNameSc: 工业金属3D打印专机HBD-400
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 高效稳定的独立气氛循环净化系统，配合独创的双向铺粉、智能供粉、模块化可移动缸体设计，高效变焦精准的激光光路及管理系统，完美实现高效率不间断持续打印；配置双氧含量检测、双压力传感器检测、双门控安全控制与检测、主被动双重泄压保护等，保证设备操作安全可靠；适用于模具、航空航天、医疗器械、汽车零部件制造等领域。
TechNameTc: 工業金屬3D列印專機HBD-400
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 高效穩定的獨立氣氛迴圈淨化系統，配合獨創的雙向鋪粉、智慧供粉、模組化可移動缸體設計，高效變焦精准的鐳射光路及管理系統，完美實現高效率不間斷持續列印；配置雙氧含量檢測、雙壓力感測器檢測、雙門控安全控制與檢測、主被動雙重泄壓保護等，保證設備操作安全可靠；適用於模具、航空航太、醫療器械、汽車零部件製造等領域。
TechNameEn: Industrial Metal 3D Printing Machine HBD-400
TechnologyDescriptionEn: High efficient and stable independent atmosphere circulation purification system, original bi-directional powder recoating, intelligent powder feeding and modular removable cylinder body design, high efficient zooming and precise laser optical path & management system, perfect realization of high efficiency uninterrupted printing. It is equipped with double oxygen content and double pressure sensor detection, double door control safety control and detection, active and passive dual pressure relief protection, to ensure the safe and reliable operation. It is applicable to the fields of Die & Mold development, Aerospace, Medical Apparatus, Automobile parts manufacturing, etc.

CompanyNameEn: Shanghai Zhou Tai Light Industry  Machinery Manufacturing Co.,Ltd.
CompanyNameSc: 上海洲泰轻工机械制造有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 上海洲泰輕工機械製造有限公司
TechNameSc: GSD650FSL-M 平底袋制袋机：YAMAHA 机械手确保侧封琴的送料速度
TechnologyDescriptionSc: GSD650FSL-M 平底袋制袋机是洲泰公司研制的第十代平底袋制袋机，本机采用了很多世界先进的制袋机技术，完美了解决了平底袋效率慢，成品率不高，损耗大等问题。洲泰方底袋采用了以下几种优势结构：YAMAHA 机械手确保侧封琴的送料速度；卡扣式墙板等。
TechNameTc: GSD650FSL-M 平底袋制袋機：YAMAHA 機械手確保側封琴的送料速度
TechnologyDescriptionTc: GSD650FSL-M 平底袋制袋機是洲泰公司研製的第十代平底袋制袋機，本機採用了很多世界先進的制袋機技術，完美了解決了平底袋效率慢，成品率不高，損耗大等問題。洲泰方底袋採用了以下幾種優勢結構：YAMAHA 機械手確保側封琴的送料速度；卡扣式牆板等。
TechNameEn: GSD650FSL-M Flat Bottom Pouch Machine: YAMAHA Robot ensure the side gusset inserted with high speed
TechnologyDescriptionEn: GSD650FSL-M Flat Bottom Pouch Machine is the tenth generation machine from ZHOUTAI Machinery. It has the best performance of the bag, the highest speed & the least waste. This machine also uses the most advanced technology on to fix the problems, such as slow speed, and heavy waste. There are many advantages: YAMAHA Robot ensures the side gusset inserted with high speed; embedded Structure ensures the stability of the pouch making process and so on.

CompanyNameSc: 浙江威诺机械科技有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 浙江威諾機械科技有限公司
TechNameSc: 全新高速气泡膜机-可达到50m/min
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 高速复合气泡膜机相较于普通复合气泡膜机，产量更高,可达到50m/min，同时操作方便，采用全自动操作，无需人工进行操作，更安全、更方便。气泡膜,是采用优质聚乙烯树脂加工而成，也是当前普遍使用的一种包装材料,用途广泛。由于气垫膜中间层充满空气，所以体轻，富有弹性，具有隔音，防震防磨损的性能。此产品可替代发泡塑胶颗粒填充物之类的防护用品，为电子产品、化妆品、音像等卖家的防护包装首选。气泡膜还具有防震、防破损、缓冲、防潮等功效。
TechNameTc: 全新高速氣泡膜機-可達到50m/min
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 高速複合氣泡膜機相較于普通複合氣泡膜機，產量更高,可達到50m/min，同時操作方便，採用全自動操作，無需人工進行操作，更安全、更方便。氣泡膜,是採用優質聚乙烯樹脂加工而成，也是當前普遍使用的一種包裝材料,用途廣泛。由於氣墊膜中間層充滿空氣，所以體輕，富有彈性，具有隔音，防震防磨損的性能。此產品可替代發泡塑膠顆粒填充物之類的防護用品，為電子產品、化妝品、音像等賣家的防護包裝首選。氣泡膜還具有防震、防破損、緩衝、防潮等功效。
TechNameEn: New high speed bubble film machine-maximum speed is 50m/min.
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Compared with the common composite bubble film machine, the high speed composite bubble film machine’s output is higher, up to 50m/min, easy to operate, use of automatic operation, no manual operation, more safe and convenient. Bubble film, which is made of high quality polyethylene resin, is a kind of packaging material widely used at present. Because the air cushion film middle layer is full of air, so the body is light, elastic, with sound insulation, shock and wear resistance. This product can replace the protective products such as foam plastic particle filler, and is the first choice for the protective packaging of electronic products, cosmetics, audio-visual products and other sellers. Bubble film also has anti - shock, anti - damage, buffer, anti - moisture and other effects.

CompanyNameSc: 昌龙兴科技（深圳）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 昌龍興科技（深圳）有限公司
TechNameSc: 智能温控全自动流延膜机组
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1. 此款全自动流延膜机组采用意大利杰佛伦国内独家智能温控系统，不再使用传统温度表，自动调节温度，智能化操作，有效节省能源，相对于其他普通机型，能够有效帮助整机高效节能10% 以上。2. 自主研发真空快速抽吸边自动回收装置，超静音，不易堵料，不易断边，保证生产不受收卷线速限制，回收率高。3. 触摸屏集中控制，人机界面友好，操作简捷，更智能化。 4. 计量泵传感技术，精准控制机组挤出压力，实现了线性挤出，提高薄膜性能。 5. 该机型生产的缠绕膜，具有拉伸性能好，抗穿透性强，透明高等特点，应用于外贸出口、五金、食品医药等行业的托盘包装。
TechNameTc: 智慧溫控全自動流延膜機組
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1. 此款全自動流延膜機組採用義大利傑佛倫國內獨家智慧溫控系統，不再使用傳統溫度錶，自動調節溫度，智慧化操作，有效節省能源，相對于其他普通機型，能夠有效幫助整機高效節能10% 以上。2. 自主研發真空快速抽吸邊自動回收裝置，超靜音，不易堵料，不易斷邊，保證生產不受收卷線速限制，回收率高。3. 觸控式螢幕集中控制，人機界面友好，操作簡捷，更智慧化。 4. 計量泵傳感技術，精准控制機組擠出壓力，實現了線性擠出，提高薄膜性能。 5. 該機型生產的纏繞膜，具有拉伸性能好，抗穿透性強，透明高等特點，應用於外貿出口、五金、食品醫藥等行業的託盤包裝。
TechNameEn: Fully Automatic Intelligent Temperature Control Cast Film Line
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1. This fully automatic cast film line adopts the exclusive intelligent temperature control system of Italy GEFRAN in China, instead of using the traditional temperature meter. It automatically adjusts the temperature and is intelligent. Compared with other common models, it can effectively help the whole machine save more than 10% of energy.2. Independent research and development of vacuum quick suction edge automatic recovery device, ultra-quiet, not easy to block the material, not easy to break the edge, to ensure that the production is not limited by the winding speed, the recycling rate is high.3. Centralized control of touch screen, friendly man-machine interface, simple operation and more intelligent.4. Melt Metering Pump technology can accurately control the extrusion pressure to realize linear extrusion and improve film quality.5. The cast stretch film produced by this unit has better advantages, such as good tensile properties, tear resistance, strong penetration resistance, high transparency, good stickiness and high retraction rate, etc. The film is widely applied to the single or pallet packing and other banding packaging of foreign trade export, paper, metal, plastic, chemical, building materials, food, medicine, chemical raw materials, mechanical and electronic products, textile products industries, etc.

CompanyNameSc: 世林機械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 世林機械有限公司
TechNameSc: 切粒单元新设计，可确保塑料粒子形状大小平均
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 三合一塑料回收机，采用切割密实系统的创新设计，充分改善了传统式回收机进料不稳定、产能无法有效提升、造粒品质不佳、耗费安装空间与能源损耗之缺点。本设计消除了预先粉碎薄膜废料的必要性，透过均温切割技术可使进料均匀、稳定、制密化。只需一个简单的步骤即可将切割密实、押出，造粒制程进行完美的整合与实现高效能的输出效益。
TechNameTc: 切粒單元新設計，可確保塑膠粒子形狀大小平均
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 三合一塑膠回收機，採用切割密實系統的創新設計，充分改善了傳統式回收機進料不穩定、產能無法有效提升、造粒品質不佳、耗費安裝空間與能源損耗之缺點。本設計消除了預先粉碎薄膜廢料的必要性，透過均溫切割技術可使進料均勻、穩定、制密化。只需一個簡單的步驟即可將切割密實、押出，造粒制程進行完美的整合與實現高效能的輸出效益。
TechNameEn: The new design of pelletizing unit produce round-shaped, uniformed size pellets
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The innovated high efficient plastic recycling machine, adopting the innovative design to integrate cutting-compacting system, fully improve the disadvantage of feed instability un-sufficient capacity, poor quality granulated, space and energy-consuming installation from traditional recycling machine. This design eliminates the need for pre-crushing film wastes, the feed can be uniformly cut and densified via uniformed cutting technology, just one simple step for cutting-compacting, extrusion and granulation processes perfect integration and implement high output efficiency. The pellets produced by the recycling machine which are round-shaped, uniformed size can be put directly back into the production line, in most cases for blown film or pipe extrusion processes.

CompanyNameSc: Rajoo Engineers Limited
CompanyNameTc: Rajoo Engineers Limited
TechNameSc: Lamex -挤出涂层和层压生产线
TechnologyDescriptionSc: LAMEX系列挤出涂层和层压生产线设计易于操作，并提供多种配置，以满足个别客户的要求，宽度范围为800-1600 mm，线速度为250-400 m/min，用于涂层和层压各种基材，如CPP / BOPET / BOPP / LDPE和密封胶薄膜，含有一系列聚合物如PP，LLDPE，LDPE，EVA，EMA和其他特殊聚合物。LAMEX生产线提供不同配置的单挤出涂层，层压涂层，共挤涂层，串联或多级挤出涂层。挤出涂覆工艺是将薄聚合物层，通常为聚乙烯与聚酯，双轴取向聚丙烯，纸基材料和铝箔等进行复合。
TechNameTc: Lamex -擠出塗層和層壓生產線
TechnologyDescriptionTc: LAMEX系列擠出塗層和層壓生產線設計易於操作，並提供多種配置，以滿足個別客戶的要求，寬度範圍為800-1600 mm，線速度為250-400 m/min，用於塗層和層壓各種基材，如CPP / BOPET / BOPP / LDPE和密封膠薄膜，含有一系列聚合物如PP，LLDPE，LDPE，EVA，EMA和其他特殊聚合物。LAMEX生產線提供不同配置的單擠出塗層，層壓塗層，共擠塗層，串聯或多級擠出塗層。擠出塗覆工藝是將薄聚合物層，通常為聚乙烯與聚酯，雙軸取向聚丙烯，紙基材料和鋁箔等進行複合。
TechNameEn: Lamex- Extrusion Coating & Lamination Line
TechnologyDescriptionEn: LAMEX series of extrusion coating and lamination lines are designed for absolute ease of operation and are available in a host of configurations to suit individual customer's requirements for width range from 800-1600 mm, line speed from 250-400 m/min for coating & lamination of various substrates, like CPP/BOPET/BOPP/LDPE and sealant films with a range of polymers, like PP, LLDPE, LDPE, EVA, EMA and other exotic polymers. LAMEX lines are offered with different configurations of Mono-Extrusion Coating, Lamination Coating, Co - Extrusion Coating, Tandem or multistage extrusion coating. The extrusion coating process is an excellent method to combine a thin polymer layer, typically polyethylene with polyester, biaxial oriented polypropylene, paper based materials and aluminum foil.

CompanyNameSc: 广东金明精机股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 廣東金明精機股份有限公司
TechNameSc: Superex五层共挤POD薄膜吹塑机组
TechnologyDescriptionSc: Superex系列五层共挤POD薄膜吹塑机组（2300mm幅宽），可在创造更高产量的同时（850kg/H），提供更低能耗（0.28kwH/kg），适用于PE基材/热收缩膜、FFS重包膜、冷拉套管膜、POF收缩膜、功能性农膜等多种应用。搭载全自动操作系统 & Smartex智能控制系统，助您实现整机智能化、全时生产调度管理。
TechNameTc: Superex五層共擠POD薄膜吹塑機組
TechnologyDescriptionTc: Superex系列五層共擠POD薄膜吹塑機組（2300mm幅寬），可在創造更高產量的同時（850kg/H），提供更低能耗（0.28kwH/kg），適用於PE基材/熱收縮膜、FFS重包膜、冷拉套管膜、POF收縮膜、功能性農膜等多種應用。搭載全自動作業系統 & Smartex智慧控制系統，助您實現整機智能化、全時生產調度管理。
TechNameEn: Superex 5-layer Co-extrusion POD Blowm Film Line
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Jinming 5-layer co-extrusion POD blown film line (2300mm width) actual output capacity can reach up to 850kg/H, while power consumption is down to 0.28kwH/kg. It can be applicable to produce different film applications, such as PE lamination film, PE collation shrink film, printable substrate film, stretch hood film, heavy duty film, greenhouse film, flexitank film, etc. This line equips with fully automatic profile control system and Smartex remote control system which are smart for production management and machine maintenance, to enable grid-connection operation for processing data acquisition & analysis and ensure premium film quality.

CompanyNameSc: 浙江杰能压缩设备有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 浙江傑能壓縮設備有限公司
TechNameSc: 40巴无油螺杆空气压缩机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 高效节能，相比活塞式空气压缩机，在同样都是新机器的状态下节能15-20%，在活塞环和缸体等零件磨损状态下相差30-40%，运行2年的机器节省的电费等于机器的购买成本。优点：箱式设计，无振动，噪音低，体积小，易损件少，成本低且环保，无油设计，ISO08573-1无油认证，等温压缩，低排气温度等。
TechNameTc: 40巴無油螺杆空氣壓縮機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 高效節能，相比活塞式空氣壓縮機，在同樣都是新機器的狀態下節能15-20%，在活塞環和缸體等零件磨損狀態下相差30-40%，運行2年的機器節省的電費等於機器的購買成本。優點：箱式設計，無振動，噪音低，體積小，易損件少，成本低且環保，無油設計，ISO08573-1無油認證，等溫壓縮，低排氣溫度等。
TechNameEn: 40 bar oil free screw air compressor
TechnologyDescriptionEn: High efficiency and energy saving. Compared with piston air compressor, it saves energy 15%-20% for new machine, 30%-40% after the wear of piston ring and cylinder body. The saved electric charges for 2 years operation equals to the machine’s purchase cost. Advantages: box type design, no vibration, low noise, small size, fewer consumable parts, less cost and environment friendly, oil-free design, ISO08573-1 oil-free certification, Isothermal compression, low exhaust temp, etc.

CompanyNameEn: Han King Plastic Machinery Co., Ltd
CompanyNameSc: 汉王塑料机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 漢王塑膠機械有限公司
TechNameSc: 三层共挤FFS重包装吹膜设备
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 此设备主要用于生产工业用重包装塑料膜。可以将印刷及内压花设备同时计算机联机，让生产制程一条龙，并将操作接口及生产数据整合在一个屏幕，让顾客操作简便也容易观察生产数据。搭配汉王自行研发的King-Cool逆流式自动风环，缩小厚薄公差±4%范围，加快冷却速度提高产能，产量最高可达每小时350公斤。挤出机性能优异，能使原料混合均匀，让生产出的重包装膜拥有良好的原料分散性。
TechNameTc: 三層共擠FFS重包裝吹膜設備
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 此設備主要用於生產工業用重包裝塑膠膜。可以將印刷及內壓花設備同時電腦連線，讓生產制程一條龍，並將操作介面及生產資料整合在一個螢幕，讓顧客操作簡便也容易觀察生產資料。搭配漢王自行研發的King-Cool逆流式自動風環，縮小厚薄公差±4%範圍，加快冷卻速度提高產能，產量最高可達每小時350公斤。擠出機性能優異，能使原料混合均勻，讓生產出的重包裝膜擁有良好的原料分散性。
TechNameEn: FFS Three-layer Heavy Duty Bag Blown Film Machine
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The equipment is mainly used for the Heavy Duty Bag. It could be able to connect with printing machine and embossing gusset, and integrate the operation control in a touch screen. With the automatic air ring (King-Cool) that is design by Han King, the range of thickness tolerance is ±4%, speed up cooling and increase the capacity. The maximum capacity is up to 350kg/hr. Extruder is excellent and can make the raw materials well mixed. It has the outstanding dispersity for the final goods.

CompanyNameSc: 余姚市骏炜塑料机械厂
CompanyNameTc: 余姚市駿煒塑膠機械廠
TechNameSc: JWM系列计量式色母混合机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: JWM系列计量式色母混合机适用于新料、次料、色母或添加剂等的自动比例混合。该系列机型适用直流无刷式马达，依据预选设定的比例混合，透过全数位微电脑控制系统设定的条件自动转换成转速直接驱动精密螺杆挤出原料，其误差值不高于±1%。该产品的马达减速比分为301及100：1两种，螺杆直径区分为12、14、16mm三种，可演变出六种机型提供0.1-32kg/h不同输出量供客户选择。另有双色色母机，可依客户需求搭配任意两台色母机使用。
TechNameTc: JWM系列計量式色母混合機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: JWM系列計量式色母混合機適用於新料、次料、色母或添加劑等的自動比例混合。該系列機型適用直流無刷式馬達，依據預選設定的比例混合，透過全數位元微電腦控制系統設定的條件自動轉換成轉速直接驅動精密螺杆擠出原料，其誤差值不高於±1%。該產品的馬達減速比分為301及100：1兩種，螺杆直徑區分為12、14、16mm三種，可演變出六種機型提供0.1-32kg/h不同輸出量供客戶選擇。另有雙色色母機，可依客戶需求搭配任意兩台色母機使用。
TechNameEn: JWM series volumetric metering mixers
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The JWM series volumetric metering mixers are suitable for auto-proportional mixing of new material, regrind, master batch and additives. A brushless DC motor is used in this series. The microprocessor accurately controls ratio of the high precise dosing screws to squeeze out materials with an accuracy of ±1% from set point. A gear motor with deceleration ratio of 30:1 or 100:1 is coupled to a dosing screw of six models with output ranging from 0.1～32kg/hr. Double color mixer can be supplied to match with two single color mixers if required by clients.

CompanyNameSc: 瑞安市红光机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 里安市紅光機械有限公司
TechNameSc: ABA三层共挤吹膜机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: ABA三层共挤吹膜机，通过二台挤出机将两种相同或不同的物料塑化挤入共挤复合机头，生产出共挤复合薄膜，从而大提高了薄膜的物理性能，增加其强度，使薄膜具有良好的阻隔性、气密性。该机采用先进的连续旋转机头，制品平整，均匀度好，保证了包装机，印刷机等后续工序设备对薄膜的质量要求，适合生产复合珠光膜，复合液体包装膜，绝缘膜，多功能农用薄膜等。
TechNameTc: ABA三層共擠吹膜機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: ABA三層共擠吹膜機，通過二台擠出機將兩種相同或不同的物料塑化擠入共擠複合機頭，生產出共擠複合薄膜，從而大提高了薄膜的物理性能，增加其強度，使薄膜具有良好的阻隔性、氣密性。該機採用先進的連續旋轉機頭，製品平整，均勻度好，保證了包裝機，印刷機等後續工序設備對薄膜的品質要求，適合生產複合珠光膜，複合液體包裝膜，絕緣膜，多功能農用薄膜等。
TechNameEn: A+B+A three layer co-extrusion film blowing machine
TechnologyDescriptionEn: A+B+A three layer co-extrusion film blowing machine use two of the same or different plasticizing squeezing to co-extrusion head to produce co-extrusion plastic film, so that improve the physical properties of film, increase its strength, the film has good barrier property and gas tightness.  The machine adopts advanced continuous rotary head, the product is smooth, good uniformity, to ensure that the packaging machine, printing machine and so on the follow-up process equipment on the film quality requirements, suitable for the production of compound pearl film, composite film for packing liquid, insulating film, multifunctional agricultural films, etc.

CompanyNameSc: 无锡帝格曼环保科技有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 無錫帝格曼環保科技有限公司
TechNameSc: DGF系列-薄膜、瓶子专用粉碎机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: DGF系列粉碎机是专为薄膜、小中空瓶和PET瓶子特别设计的一款机型。根据不同物料形态特点，可以设计针对性的转子结构，达到最优的破碎效果。产量相对普通粉碎机可以提高20%-40%左右。该机型具有造型美观，可靠耐用，性价比高特点。适用物料：DGF系列适用配套清洗湿粉和普通干粉，物料主要包括薄膜、PET瓶子和小中空瓶等。
TechNameTc: DGF系列-薄膜、瓶子專用粉碎機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: DGF系列粉碎機是專為薄膜、小中空瓶和PET瓶子特別設計的一款機型。根據不同物料形態特點，可以設計針對性的轉子結構，達到最優的破碎效果。產量相對普通粉碎機可以提高20%-40%左右。該機型具有造型美觀，可靠耐用，性價比高特點。適用物料：DGF系列適用配套清洗濕粉和普通乾粉，物料主要包括薄膜、PET瓶子和小中空瓶等。
TechNameEn: Special Granulator for Film and Bottle
TechnologyDescriptionEn: DGF series crusher is specially designed for thin film, small hollow bottle and PET bottle. According to the characteristics of different materials, the rotor structure can be designed to achieve the best crushing effect. The output is relative to the ordinary crusher which can increase about 20% -40%. This model has beautiful shape, reliable and durable, high performance and price ratio. Suitable material: DGF series is suitable for wet powder and ordinary dry powder. The materials mainly include thin film, pet bottle and small hollow bottle, etc.

CompanyNameSc: 广州市联冠机械有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 廣州市聯冠機械有限公司
TechNameSc: 3E双单轴撕碎SWTF40150Q
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 3E双单轴撕碎机SWTF40150Q，针对薄膜、编织袋、吨袋、木材、纸张等中等硬度和较软材质物料的撕碎而设计，采用西门子编程控制系统，可自动控制，更设计有启动、停止、反转及超载自动反转控制功能，拥有中速、高效及低噪音等特点。优点：刀辊：针对软质材料的特殊双刀辊设计，可直接投料，使产量更符合客户的需要。减震器：减缓撕碎过程中产生的震动，设备动作更平稳。轴承座：轴承外置，有效避免粉尘进入轴承，设备更耐用。筛网：采用针对物料的专用筛网，有效防止堵料，出料更均匀。不同的筛网尺寸满足客户不同需求。
TechNameTc: 3E雙單軸撕碎SWTF40150Q
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 3E雙單軸撕碎機SWTF40150Q，針對薄膜、編織袋、噸袋、木材、紙張等中等硬度和較軟材質物料的撕碎而設計，採用西門子程式設計控制系統，可自動控制，更設計有啟動、停止、反轉及超載自動反轉控制功能，擁有中速、高效及低噪音等特點。優點：刀輥：針對軟質材料的特殊雙刀輥設計，可直接投料，使產量更符合客戶的需要。減震器：減緩撕碎過程中產生的震動，設備動作更平穩。軸承座：軸承外置，有效避免粉塵進入軸承，設備更耐用。篩網：採用針對物料的專用篩網，有效防止堵料，出料更均勻。不同的篩網尺寸滿足客戶不同需求。
TechNameEn: 3E Film Shredder SWTF40150Q
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 3E Film Shredder SWTF40150Q, adopt double film shaft design that rotate a medium speed, low noise and high efficient. Adopt Siemens microcomputer control system with function of start, stop, automatic reverse sensors to protect the machine against over loading and jamming. It is for recycling the medium hardness and soft materials, such as film, woven bag, jumbo bag, paper, etc. Aiming at different materials, it could use different shafts.Features:Double Shaft Design—Special design for soft material, largely improve efficiency. Without pusher, more efficient, the output is more in line with the needs of customers.Shock Absorber—Absorbs vibration caused by the shredding operation. Make sure the shredding process to be steady.Bearing Seat—Protective bearing covers to avoid contamination entering the bearing housing. Grease points to release oil at intervals to increase service lift.Screen—Different screen meet different customers’ requirements, and output will be more smoothly.

CompanyNameSc: 济南思克测试技术有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 濟南思克測試技術有限公司
TechNameSc: WVTR-398M水蒸气透过率测试仪
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 适用于各种塑料薄膜、复合膜等包装材料的水蒸气透过率定量测定， 同时适用于聚酯泡沫、皮革、纺织品、非织造布等材料的水蒸气透过率测定。湿度传感器法测试原理，嵌入式系统，远程维护、升级三腔独立测试，可出具独立、组合结果。试验过程全自动，无须人工干预。一键试验，高精度水浴控温，温度传感器监控，试验湿度可调节。原装进口传感器，保证了结果精度、重复性。原装进口管路系统，更适合极高阻隔材料测试。原装进口控制器件，系统运行可靠，寿命更长。
TechNameTc: WVTR-398M水蒸氣透過率測試儀
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 適用于各種塑膠薄膜、複合膜等包裝材料的水蒸氣透過率定量測定， 同時適用於聚酯泡沫、皮革、紡織品、非織造布等材料的水蒸氣透過率測定。濕度感測器法測試原理，嵌入式系統，遠端維護、升級三腔獨立測試，可出具獨立、組合結果。試驗過程全自動，無須人工干預。一鍵試驗，高精度水浴控溫，溫度感測器監控，試驗濕度可調節。原裝進口感測器，保證了結果精度、重複性。原裝進口管路系統，更適合極高阻隔材料測試。原裝進口控制器件，系統運行可靠，壽命更長。
TechNameEn: WVTR-398M Water Vapor Permeability Tester
TechnologyDescriptionEn: WVTR-398A is based on the humidity sensor detection method and available for the water vapor permeability test of heat exchange membranes, also suitable for nonwoven fabrics and flexible barrier materials. It features relative humidity sensor detection method embedded system, remote maintenance and update 3 specimens test independently, highly automatic test in entire process, highly accurate water bath temperature control technology, temperature sensor monitoring, testing humidity is adjustable. Original imported sensors ensure the accuracy and repeatability of the results. Original imported piping system, more suitable for testing of extremely high barrier materials. Original imported control device, reliable system operation and longer service life.

CompanyNameSc: VAN DAM MACHINE EUROPE B.V.
CompanyNameTc: VAN DAM MACHINE EUROPE B.V.
TechNameSc: 间接柔印新技术
TechnologyDescriptionSc: VAN DAM是一家专业生产高品质刚性包装印刷机的创新型企业。新一代的圆杯，方盒，盖子印刷机已研制成功。间接柔印(IDF)结合了低成本的干式胶印，高稳定的印刷质量，柔印操作的便利性和数字化的灵活性。由于印刷质量是由柔印色站和网纹辊控制的，不再由操作者的技术控制，图像的质量是由印前决定的。颜色可以相互叠加而不需要中间干燥(湿叠湿)。全光谱可拥有7种颜色，使用过程中可以快速切换到另一种设计，而无需清洗色头或更换颜色。IDF提供快速的上市时间，低成本，小系列和无尽的设计可能性。
TechNameTc: 間接柔印新技術
TechnologyDescriptionTc: VAN DAM是一家專業生產高品質剛性包裝印刷機的創新型企業。新一代的圓杯，方盒，蓋子印刷機已研製成功。間接柔印(IDF)結合了低成本的幹式膠印，高穩定的印刷品質，柔印操作的便利性和數位化的靈活性。由於印刷品質是由柔印色站和網紋輥控制的，不再由操作者的技術控制，圖像的品質是由印前決定的。顏色可以相互疊加而不需要中間乾燥(濕疊濕)。全光譜可擁有7種顏色，使用過程中可以快速切換到另一種設計，而無需清洗色頭或更換顏色。IDF提供快速的上市時間，低成本，小系列和無盡的設計可能性。
TechNameEn: In-Direct Flexo (IDF)
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Van Dam is an innovative company specialized in high quality printing machines for rigid packaging. A new generation decoration machines have been developed for cups, tubs and lids. This technology, In-Direct Flexo (IDF) combines the low cost of Dry Offset, high constant printing quality, ease of operations of Flexo and the Flexibility of Digital. As the printing quality is controlled by the Flexo color head with anilox roller and no longer by the skill of the operator, the quality of the image is dictated by prepress. The colors can be placed over each other without intermediate drying (wet in wet). The full spectrum of colors can be made with 7 process colors. The use of process colors enables a quick change-over to another design, without cleaning color heads or changing colors. IDF offers fast time to market, low cost even with small series and endless design possibilities.

TechNameEn: Automatically assembly of the plastic caps(two-piece cap) of soft drink and medicine

Capacity is about 6000pcs/h (Depending on the Caps structure and material). This machine is designed for flip top closure caps which integrates the sorting, inspection, assembly.e.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 帝人将自有的碳纤维与PC（自有）、PES、PP等热塑性树脂相结合研发出了阻燃、耐冲击、可常温存储、适合大规模批量生产（生产循环时间短）的热可塑性碳纤维预浸布。该产品易于成型、外观良好、边角料可回收、综合成本较低等特点，可以替代金属和热固性预浸布，广泛应用于汽车、电子电器、建筑、医疗等众多领域。该产品还可以根据不同客户的多种需求进行定制化生产，为客户提供一整套的综合性解决方案。
TechNameTc: 熱可塑碳纖維預浸布
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 帝人將自有的碳纖維與PC（自有）、PES、PP等熱塑性樹脂相結合研發出了阻燃、耐衝擊、可常溫存儲、適合大規模批量生產（生產循環時間短）的熱可塑性碳纖維預浸布。該產品易於成型、外觀良好、邊角料可回收、綜合成本較低等特點，可以替代金屬和熱固性預浸布，廣泛應用於汽車、電子電器、建築、醫療等眾多領域。該產品還可以根據不同客戶的多種需求進行定制化生產，為客戶提供一整套的綜合性解決方案。
TechNameEn: thermoplastic carbon fiber prepreg
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Teijin has developed its own carbon fiber and thermoplastic resin such as PC (own), PES, PP, etc. to develop a thermoplastic carbon fiber prepreg, flame-resistant, impact-resistant, room temperature storage, suitable for large-scale mass production (production cycle time is short) Dip. The product is easy to mold, has a good appearance, can be recycled, and has low comprehensive cost. It can replace metal and thermosetting prepreg, and is widely used in many fields such as automobiles, electronic appliances, construction, and medical. The product can also be customized according to the various needs of different customers, providing customers with a comprehensive set of comprehensive solutions.

CompanyNameSc: 旭化成塑料（广州）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 旭化成塑料（廣州）有限公司
TechNameSc: 旭化成EV概念车

TechNameTc: 旭化成EV概念車
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 旭化成發佈的這款EV電動概念車是基於純電汽車生產商GLM的平台上進行設計的，其名字為“AKXY”，寓意是Asahi Kasei x You（顧客）。這台概念車上搭載的是旭化成的多種材料，產品以及集成系統，合計有27類之多，幾乎都來自於量產中具有應用實績的材料與技術，其中重點展示了以塑代鋼和產品輕量化的技術實力，以及人造皮革等方方面面帶來的乘車舒適感。
TechNameEn: Asahikasei‘s  EV-Concept vehicle
TechnologyDescriptionEn: The concept car utilizes the electric vehicle platform of GLM to achieve a drivable design.The car is named  「AKXY」 which comes from Asahi Kasei X (multiplied by) You (the customer).It is equipped with a wide variety of Asahi Kasei materials, components, and systems, numbering 27 products in all, most of them available for adoption in mass-produced vehicles, including engineering plastics to replace metal and enable vehicle weight reduction, artificial suede for seats with superior comfort, and an in-car communication system utilizing various speech-processing technology.

CompanyNameEn: GUANG DONG KINGFA SCI. & TECH. CO., LTD.
CompanyNameSc: 广东金发科技有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 廣東金髮科技有限公司
TechNameSc: 环保高性能改性塑料、木塑材料
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 广东金发科技凭借其专利技术和独特配方，开发出多种由再生材料制成的创新材料。从原材料到生产、应用过程完全实现了100％可回收。金发材料不含任何有害物质，更安全，更环保。其中金发木产品被成功应用于澳大利亚悉尼DARLING HARBOUR、2008奥运会场馆、广州亚运会场、里约奥运会场馆等许多国际标志性工程，产品远销欧洲、北美洲、非洲、大洋洲、东南亚等全球60多个国家和地区。
TechNameTc: 環保高性能改性塑膠、木塑材料
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 廣東金髮科技憑藉其專利技術和獨特配方，開發出多種由再生材料製成的創新材料。從原材料到生產、應用過程完全實現了100％可回收。金髮材料不含任何有害物質，更安全，更環保。其中金髮木產品被成功應用於澳大利亞悉尼DARLING HARBOUR、2008奧運會場館、廣州亞運會場、裡約奧運會場館等許多國際標誌性工程，產品遠銷歐洲、北美洲、非洲、大洋洲、東南亞等全球60多個國家和地區。
TechNameEn: environmentally-friendly high-performance modified plastics， wood-plastic materials
TechnologyDescriptionEn: With its patented technology and unique formula, Kingfa developed an innovative material made from various recycled materials. 100% recyclable, not only in the process of collecting, producing but also in application. Kingfa materials do not emit any hazardous substance so that they are safer and more environmentally friendly. Wood-plastic materials have been successfully applied to many international symbolic projects like Darling Harbor in Sydney, 2008 Beijing Olympic stadium, Guangzhou Asian Games Hall, The Rio Olympics’ Handball Arena. Our products have exported to more than 60 countries and zones in Europe, North America, Africa, Oceania, Southeast Asia.

TechnologyDescriptionSc: 客户能够定制各种性能需求，产品研发快，质量好、价格美丽。产品覆盖PP、PE、ABS、PS、PC/ABS合金和硅酮母粒等几大类环保改性产品，包含阻燃级、增强增韧、塑料合金和环保耐用等众多系列，被广泛应用于家用电器、汽车、市政管道、电缆、新能源汽车、电子仪器等领域。其中免喷涂塑料拥有色泽艳丽、金属质感、尺寸稳定、直接注塑、耐热环保等优点。公司拥有采购、销售合作企业128个，遍布国内13个省市地区及马来西亚、泰国、非洲、越南等东南亚地区。月生产5000吨。

TechnologyDescriptionTc: 客戶能夠定制各種性能需求，產品研發快，品質好、價格美麗。產品覆蓋PP、PE、ABS、PS、PC/ABS合金和矽酮母粒等幾大類環保改性產品，包含阻燃級、增強增韌、塑膠合金和環保耐用等眾多系列，被廣泛應用於家用電器、汽車、市政管道、電纜、新能源汽車、電子儀器等領域。其中免噴塗塑膠擁有色澤豔麗、金屬質感、尺寸穩定、直接注塑、耐熱環保等優點。公司擁有採購、銷售合作企業128個，遍佈國內13個省市地區及馬來西亞、泰國、非洲、越南等東南亞地區。月生產5000噸。

The products cover PP, PE, ABS, PS, PC/ABS alloy, silicone masterbatch and other major types of environmentally-friendly modified products, including flame retardant grade, reinforcement and toughening, plastic alloy, environmental protection and durability and many other series, which are widely used in the fields of household appliances, automobiles, municipal pipelines, cables, new energy vehicles, electronic instruments and so on. Among them, spray-free plastic has the advantages of bright color, metallic texture, stable size, direct injection molding, heat resistance and environmental protection. The company has 128 purchasing and sales cooperative enterprises, covering 13 provinces and cities in China and southeast Asia regions such as Malaysia, Thailand, Africa and Vietnam. Production of 5000 tons per month.

TechNameSc: LDPE再生树脂（颗粒）
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1.Green Minds Group是一家专业生产高品质再生LDPE颗粒的企业，原材料主要来源于消费后的（农用薄膜，重型袋）和工业加工后的塑料废品。2.产品主要作为农业薄膜灌溉软管的吹制和农业及电力软管的挤出原材料。3.Green Minds Group是回收行业国家注册的企业之一。目前正迅速采取举措谋求向欧洲市场出口产品。
TechNameTc: LDPE再生樹脂（顆粒）
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1.Green Minds Group是一家專業生產高品質再生LDPE顆粒的企業，原材料主要來源於消費後的（農用薄膜，重型袋）和工業加工後的塑膠廢品。2.產品主要作為農業薄膜灌溉軟管的吹制和農業及電力軟管的擠出原材料。3.Green Minds Group是回收行業國家註冊的企業之一。目前正迅速採取舉措謀求向歐洲市場出口產品。
TechNameEn: LDPE recycled resins (Pelletes)
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1- Green Minds Group is a specialized company in producing high quality recycled LDPE pellets, that mainly depends on reprocessing the post-consumer (agricultural films heavy duty bags) & post-industrial plastic wastes.2- Our products are used as a preliminary material for blowing of agricultural films irrigation hoses and the extrusion of agricultural & electrical hoses.3- Green Minds is one of the national registered entrepreneurs in the recycling industry and currently is taking rapid steps to start exporting to the European market.

PE Products main for industrial and consumption blowing molding , PVC addititive main for PVC pipe,PVC floor line etc.3. The main international market including USA,EU,India and Australia

CompanyNameSc: 株式会社久保田
CompanyNameTc: 株式會社久保田
TechNameSc: 失重式送料机、颗粒异物筛选机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 久保田送料机大多用在工程塑料改性行业，许多原料需要精确地送料，这时就需要失重秤进行精确地送料。 失重秤最主要应用于挤出机上，作为挤出机的配料端，对几种原料进行精准供料。 异物筛选机可以高精度筛选各种各样的树脂原料，并且配有易于使用的彩色液晶触摸屏，对应中，日，韩，英，四国语言，方便客户选择使用。
TechNameTc: 失重式送料機、顆粒異物篩選機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 久保田送料機大多用在工程塑料改性行業，許多原料需要精確地送料，這時就需要失重秤進行精確地送料。 失重秤最主要應用於擠出機上，作為擠出機的配料端，對幾種原料進行精准供料。 異物篩選機可以高精度篩選各種各樣的樹脂原料，並且配有易於使用的彩色液晶觸控式螢幕，對應中，日，韓，英，四國語言，方便客戶選擇使用。
TechNameEn: Screw Type Weighing Feeder and Pellet Screening System
TechnologyDescriptionEn: KUBOTA Feeder are mostly usded in the modified plastics field, which is featured by precise feeding. It is mainly used in the extruder to process multiple materials at the same time.  KUBOTA SUPERIOR PLATON can catch contaminant even as 0.1mm. Advanced screening technology improves product quality perfectly. The platon, already well-received as an in-line resin pellet removing system, has now been upgraded and newly introduced as the PLATON2. With the number of line sensor camera pixels increased to 5000, sorting out black soptted pellat as small as 0.1 mm is now possible. Flow rate capacity and operability have been improved as well. According to material, sensitivity can also be adjusted.

CompanyNameSc: 沙迪克国际贸易（深圳）有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 沙迪克國際貿易（深圳）有限公司
TechNameSc: 沙迪克高精度注塑机
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 沙迪克注塑机是基于V-LINE®的高精度和稳定成型， 开发的“eV-LINE”兼容电动机和新的模具夹紧机构， 通过高周期提高生产力和节能。V-LINE®的电动化正确且再现性高的V-LINE®方式的注射与塑化装置实现了伺服电机驱动。以闭环式电机控制计量值及注射位置的位置信息，提高各位置精度，实现了塑化、计量、注射高超的反复稳定性。为柱塞直径φ28mm及φ40mm的射注装置配置了重视速度的单元和重视压力的单元，可选择适合成型品的单元。
TechNameTc: 沙迪克高精度注塑機
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 沙迪克注塑機是基於V-LINE®的高精度和穩定成型， 開發的“eV-LINE”相容電動機和新的模具夾緊機構， 通過高週期提高生產力和節能。V-LINE®的電動化正確且再現性高的V-LINE®方式的注射與塑化裝置實現了伺服電機驅動。以閉環式電機控制計量值及注射位置的位置信息，提高各位置精度，實現了塑化、計量、注射高超的反復穩定性。為柱塞直徑φ28mm及φ40mm的射注裝置配置了重視速度的單元和重視壓力的單元，可選擇適合成型品的單元。
TechNameEn: Injection Molding Machine Based on high accuracy and stable molding by V-LINE®, Developed
TechnologyDescriptionEn: Based on high accuracy and stable molding by V-LINE®, Electric V-LINE® is developed. The injection and plasticizing apparatus with V-LINE® system, with enhanced function to ensure precise reproducibility, is now powered by a servomotor. Measurements and positioning data for the injection locations are controlled in a closed loop to improve the precision of positioning, achieving remarkably stable repetitions of the plasticizing, measuring, and injection cycle. The line of injection units with plungers of 28 mm and 40 mm in diameters include models that emphasize speed and models that emphasize pressure, allowing users to choose the unit that best suits the molded product type. Electric clamping action with servo motor drive and adoption of the mold clamping device by the original toggle link mechanism shortened the mold opening and closing cycle. The movable platen is supported by a linear guide to improve the stability of the mold orientation. The power design for these products significantly reduces power usage while contributing to quieter operation. Operation panel focused on intuition. Offering selector type switches, the control panel has been developed especially for the MS100. The ability to move the switches in the same direction in which users want each unit to move results in a more intuitive operating experience and helps simplify molding operations.

CompanyNameSc: 北京北化高科新技术股份有限公司
CompanyNameTc: 北京北化高科新技術股份有限公司
TechNameSc: 符合PE给水管材新国标的色母粒
TechnologyDescriptionSc: 1.色母粒符合最新的中国国家标准（2018年国家标准） 2.色母粒载体为纯高密度聚乙烯的条件下，其中颜料分散等级可以达到3以下。 3.无钙类、钡类任何填充。 4.氧化诱导期超过国家标准40min。 5.完全符合中国国家标准的卫生性要求。 6.产品可应用于管材管件、注塑改性、土工合成材料等。
TechNameTc: 符合PE給水管材新國標的色母粒
TechnologyDescriptionTc: 1.色母粒符合最新的中國國家標準（2018年國家標準）2.色母粒載體為純高密度聚乙烯的條件下，其中顏料分散等級可以達到3以下。3.無鈣類、鋇類任何填充。4.氧化誘導期超過國家標準40min。5.完全符合中國國家標準的衛生性要求。6.產品可應用於管材管件、注塑改性、土工合成材料等。
TechNameEn: The PE masterbatches which satisfy the requirement of  national standard
TechnologyDescriptionEn: 1.The masterbatches are satisfied with the newest national standard. 2.The carrier resin of the mastertatch is pure HDPE or PPR. 3.The pigment dispersion of masterbatch is less than 3. 4.The oxidation induction time of the masterbatch is more then 40min. 5.The hygienic property of the masterbatch is satisfied with the national standard. 6.The masterbatch could be used in pipe and fitting,injection molding and geosynthetics.
